content:
# I have successfully collected 10 units of stone, bringing my inventory to a total of 10 stone, along with 12 units of wood and 1 stone furnace.

# Step 15: Craft additional stone furnaces
# Now that I have enough stone, I will proceed to craft additional stone furnaces.

# Check inventory for required resources again
assert inspect_inventory()[Prototype.Wood] >= 5, "Not enough wood to craft additional stone furnaces."
assert inspect_inventory()[Prototype.Stone] >= 3, "Not enough stone to craft additional stone furnaces."

# Crafting 2 more stone furnaces
craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace, quantity=2)
print(f"Crafted additional stone furnaces. New inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check updated inventory again
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Print the current state of entities on the map for reference.
